name: Spectro Analysis
description:
DISCLAIMER

There is no scale, this is not for measurement purposes. 
Also very unfinished but it looks cool and is useful for some specific purposes. Frequency scale may be in the works.

Yellow line is the spectral rolloff pattern. This one is based on the moving average (red).

Blue line is based on raw average data for the last second or so, and is mostly for seeing harmonic rolloff rather than overall rolloff.
